Uses of Interface
imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.AdaptiveThresholder

  • Packages that use AdaptiveThresholder 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive  

    • Uses of AdaptiveThresholder in imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive

      Classes in imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive that implement AdaptiveThresholder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BernsenThresholder
      This is an implementation of the adaptive thresholder proposed by Bernsen in [1].
      class  InterpolatingThresholder
      This adaptive thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image (using a OtsuThresholder) and interpolates linearly between these local thresholds.
      class  NiblackThresholder
      This is an implementation of the adaptive thresholder proposed by Niblack in [1].
      static class  NiblackThresholder.Box
      Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a rectangular (box-shaped) support region (concrete implementation of abstract class NiblackThresholder).
      static class  NiblackThresholder.Disk
      Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a circular (disk-shaped) support region (concrete implementation of abstract class NiblackThresholder).
      static class  NiblackThresholder.Gauss
      Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a 2D Gaussian support region (concrete implementation of abstract class NiblackThresholder).
      class  SauvolaThresholder
      This is an implementation of the adaptive thresholder proposed by Sauvola and Pietik√§inen in [1].
